details.floor: Hewn Stone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of an evil deity as a shrine. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

wandering_monsters.1: Giant Bat (cr 1/4, mm 323); hard, 50 xp; gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Stirge (cr 1/8, mm 284); deadly, 50 xp; bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.3: Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); easy, 25 xp; hunting for food
wandering_monsters.4: Kobold (cr 1/8, mm 195); easy, 25 xp; trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.5: Violet Fungus (cr 1/4, mm 138); hard, 50 xp; waiting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); hard, 50 xp; bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
